subject: Rachel Alexandra (Race Horse)
Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: The connections for the horse of the year are eying the $400,000 La Troienne Stakes on the Kentucky Oaks undercard Friday at Churchill Downs for her next race.
snippet: The connections for the horse of the year are eying the $400,000 La Troienne Stakes on the Kentucky Oaks undercard Friday at Churchill Downs for her next race.
